titles.title: A bill to authorize the acceptance of a donation of land for addition to Big Bend National Park, in the State of Texas.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Favorable Executive Comment Received From Interior.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-341.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Unfavorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-249.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 478.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/5/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Expands the boundaries of the Big Bend National Park, Texas, to include specified lands known as the Harte Ranch Addition. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands through donation, purchase, or exchange.
